general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and administrative functions within Sharda University for the 2025-26 period. It lists academic resources like annual examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, and university brochures, alongside initiatives for student development such as capacity building, language skills, soft skills, and entrepreneurship. The document also details university leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, legal frameworks, COVID-19 information, family counseling services, and FM radio operations. Additionally, it provides guidelines for visas and medical insurance, information on observership programs, a mentoring portal, recruiters, and international collaborations, including campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra.

career_info.summary: This text outlines career paths available after completing a course, including water supply and sanitation systems, railway network construction, and academic/research roles. It also highlights the average annual placement packages for students, ranging from 3.51 LPA to 12.00 LPA, and encourages interested individuals to pursue a career in engineering.
career_info.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Water supply and Sanitation system
• Construction of Railway networks
• Academics, Research and Development and Consultancy Services.
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.51 LPA to 12.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
